concept.title: Configure a Deduction/Benefit Plan for Canada Charitable Donations
concept.shortdesc: Many Canada organizations have a deduction plan for charitable donations. To record these donations in UltiPro, create a deduction/benefit plan for charitable donation deductions.

conbody.p: To configure charitable donations, use the Deduction Type of Other. While no longer required, you may want to enter the Registration Number for charitable donation deductions.
